author: Soma
description: This task checks health of the nodes on Arweave Network. It fetch all nodes and check their health then upload the total nodes and healthy nodes list to web3.storage. Data contains the total nodes, healthy nodes list, and each transactions available nodes. If the transaction shows Not Found, means this transaction is not on arweave.net/_tx_ but can be found on viewblock. Rewards on this task are proportionate to the time it runs, and to a lesser degree the amount staked.
migrationDescription: Release new version of task. Increase the stability and performance of the task
